survey_brief: This survey aims to understand employee participation and satisfaction with the company's corporate volunteering programs, helping to improve future initiatives.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with our corporate volunteering programs?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for familiarity assessment to gauge awareness levels.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with our corporate volunteering programs?

questions.question_text: Have you participated in any corporate volunteering programs in the past 12 months?
questions.client_notes: Binary response to filter participants vs. non-participants.

script.question_text: Have you participated in any corporate volunteering programs in the past 12 months?

questions.question_text: Which types of corporate volunteering activities have you participated in? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to understand activity preferences.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice) with an 'Other' open-text option.

script.question_text: Which types of corporate volunteering activities have you participated in? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What motivated you to participate in corporate volunteering programs? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Desire to give back to the community
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice with an 'Other' option to capture diverse motivations.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice) with an 'Other' open-text option.

script.question_text: What motivated you to participate in corporate volunteering programs? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Desire to give back to the community

questions.question_text: What barriers have prevented you from participating in corporate volunteering programs? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Lack of time due to work commitments
No barriers, I plan to participate in the future
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify common barriers.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice) with an 'Other' open-text option.

script.question_text: What barriers have prevented you from participating in corporate volunteering programs? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Lack of time due to work commitments
No barriers, I plan to participate in the future

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the corporate volunteering opportunities provided by the company?
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale with a 'Not applicable' option.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the corporate volunteering opportunities provided by the company?

questions.question_text: What types of corporate volunteering programs would you like to see offered in the future?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather suggestions for future programs.

script.question_text: What types of corporate volunteering programs would you like to see offered in the future?
